title: 'Raging Rageaholics'? - 9/12/18
description:
Hour 1 

Spartacus for President? ...A bad joke gets a very old actress a visit from the Secret Service?...'Addicted to Outrage Wednesday'...outraged that the press won't even notice it? ...No assignations since 1969...the Democrats are coming for the Democratic Socialists ...In denial of ones Rageaholicism?...Hi My Name is...and I'm a 'rageaholic'...hitting rock bottom in more ways than one?...'chaos', the operative word of the day? 

 

Hour 2 

Over 1 Million ordered to evacuate, here comes Hurricane Flo...coming together once again on 9/12...help our fellow American's in trouble and Donate Today MercuryOne.org ...'I Am Neil Armstrong' author, Brad Meltzer joins to discuss his new book for kids...America is in need of a humble hero? ...Is Pope Francis about to resign?...The Daily Wire's, Matt Walsh tells us?...gives us a Pittsburgh dioceses cover-up update?...what's the average Catholic thinking?

 

Hour 3

Drop Now if You're 'Triggered'?...conservative Professor James "Duke" Pesta, joins to discuss his College Fix Article: students should drop immediately, if you're easily offended by words ...When one Tweets about 'abortion'?...no more need for 'straight white men' ...Hillary Clinton doubles down on Kavanaugh? ...The Bob Woodward book claims and defames?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
